trans-unit.source: Manages asynchronous [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] serializers and type converters.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 관리 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 직렬 변환기 및 형식 변환기입니다.

trans-unit.source: XpsSerializationManagerAsync manages asynchronous serializers and type converters that write content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: 가 XpsSerializationManagerAsync 비동기 직렬 변환기 및 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 콘텐츠를 작성 하는 형식 변환기를 관리 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager> manages synchronous serializers and type converters that write content to an <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>동기 직렬 변환기 및 <xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument>.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsDocument> 콘텐츠를 작성 하는 형식 변환기를 관리 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManager>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Xps.Serialization.XpsSerializationManagerAsync"></xref> class.
An object that provides methods for acquiring serialization readers and writers for different parts of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
trans-unit.target: Serialization 판독기 및 작성기의 각 부분에를 가져오기 위한 메서드를 제공 하는 개체는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 문서.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to specify batch mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>일괄 처리 모드를 지정 하려면 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Commits all changes and writes all buffered data as output.
trans-unit.target: 모든 변경 내용을 커밋하고 출력으로 버퍼링 된 모든 데이터를 씁니다.

trans-unit.source: Saves a specified serialized object to an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] package.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 직렬화 된 개체를 저장 하는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] 패키지 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a serialization operation finishes.
trans-unit.target: Serialization 작업이 완료 되 면 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to use event handlers, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 처리기를 사용 하는 방법에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [NIB: 이벤트 사용](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)합니다.
